channel.title: Jominite - A Better Voting Website Development
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2i7bzty.png[/img][/center] What is this about? Well, many (if not all) of the runescape voting websites are filled with too many advertisments, and I also feel like my team and I can create a better voting system, and also a more appealing look as far as the website goes. Don't like the layout? Comment! Website - [url=http://Jominite.co.nr]Jominite.co.nr[/url] Please tell me if I should change the layout! Current Update Log: [i][/i]
[b]6/19/11 - Added - Messages System(100%)[/b] [b]6/18/11 - Fixed - Register bug has been fixed!(100%)[/b] [b]6/18/11 - Update - Updated the News Feed, easier to edit and easier to read(100%)[/b] [b]6/18/11 - New - Premium Page - Needs to be added on the Online Website(100%)[/b] [b]6/18/11 - New - Edit Page for administrators (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - New - Sponsor picture has been added, also color change! (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - Update - Voting page wasn't voting - Fixed all votes are counted now! (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - Faster Page Loading - The browser parses less things! (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - New Field - Server Owner - On ServBoard! (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - New Field - New Field To ServBoard - Long Description! (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - Updated Account - The Vote HTML Code Was Incorrect Fixed! (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - Updated Tables - All The Same Now! (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - Updated Layout More Appeasing (100%)[/b] [b]6/17/11 - Updated Server Listings - Now In Order (100%)[/b] [b]^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ VERSION 1.02 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^[/b] [b]6/17/11 - Created Voting System (100%)[/b] [b]6/16/11 - Total World Wide Vote Counter Added! (100%)[/b] [b]6/16/11 - ServBoard Created, On localhost (added on website soon) (100%)[/b] [b]6/13/11 - Updated to a better layout (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - Home page and basic layout (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - Register (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - Login (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - Publish Server (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - User Account Management (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - Sponsored (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - All Servers (100%)[/b] 6/12/11 - Edit Server (0%) [b]6/12/11 - Website Created (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - Banner Support (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - Logged in only pages (100%)[/b] [b]6/12/11 - Sponsors appear first no matter how many votes (100%)[/b] [b]^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ VERSION 1.01 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^[/b]
[b]Why would you need pictures? Visit the website to view the layout! Features are listed above![/b]

item.title: Jominite - A Better Voting Website Development
item.description:
@1511 wrote:

[quote=“jominite, post:10, topic:398975”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=496113.msg3627407#msg3627407 date=1307935949]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=496113.msg3627347#msg3627347 date=1307933241]

Goodluck. Looking forward to advertising my server on your website. (lol)

Website is out! but i’m still not done yet, there are still so many more things to be worked on. I think I will be 100% done with the features sometime around June 18 then hopefully I will get donations for a real website URL
[/quote]pm link?
[/quote]http://localhost/

localhost is for the testing before I put onto the webserver… the REAL website is out for people to view, but currently the only thing you can do is Register/Login/Logout/Publish A Server[/quote]

What is my IP?

What Is My IP - Check your IP & Free SEO Tools

WhatIsMyIp will show you your IP and location and comes with a bundled collection of the best seo tools for your website. We offer all for free of charge, Such as XML Sitemap Generator, Plagiarism Checker, Article Rewriter & more.

make sure you have port forwarded with your ip and post that ip… then we can join your website…

item.title: Jominite - A Better Voting Website Development
item.dc:creator: @jominite jominite
item.description:
@jominite wrote:

Also it is revamped for speed, I just did a speed test from phone and the site loads in .4 sec compared to Runescape which is 8 sec.
That’s about 16 times faster, just because of the less items the browser needs to parse. Will be really helpful for people who go on with their phones.

Read full topic
